title: Crockpot Chicken & Noodles
directions: Cook chicken, soup, butter, and broth in crockpot on low for 8 hours (I cooked it on low for 6 1/2 hours). Take chicken out and shred. Put chicken back in; add noodles and cook on low for 2 hours. Stir a few times while cooking. I served this over mashed potatoes, with a side of green beans.
ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (I used frozen)
1 stick of butter (eeek! I used 1/2 a stick)
chicken broth (recipe didn’t state how many so I used 2 15 oz cans)
24 oz. frozen egg noodles (I used Reames)
